title: 服务器报错
author: 紅月阿
txt_content:
关于服务器报错 内容以下

11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.PlayerConnection.a(PlayerConnection.java:227)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:463)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:478)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.plugin.TimedRegisteredListener.callEvent(TimedRegisteredListener.java:30)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:427)
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] INFO org.bukkit.event.EventException
11.05 09:22:51 [Server] 严重 Could not pass event PlayerMoveEvent to QuickTrade v1.1.8

replies.txt_content:
快速出售插件的问题
可以删除QuickTrade.jar
不过貌似删除 QuickTrade 文件夹 看看能不能修复

replies.author: 紅月阿
replies.txt_content:
Lucky777777 发表于 2014-5-11 09:52
把QuickTrade插件删掉试试
我可以不删除这插件吗？

replies.author: 玩手游
replies.txt_content: 删除快捷交易这插件吧！
